version_description:
Greetings, Peggle pals! Former prospector Buddy the turtle has joined the ranks of the Peggle Masters. Meet him in 15 exciting new levels. The full update includes:

• Buddy’s draggable bucket – catch your ball to launch a rocket-fueled peg explosion
• Warp Holes that allow you to blast through one and out another

Thanks for playing! As always, please tell us what you think of the game by rating us after each update.

Greetings, Peggle pals! Former prospector Buddy the turtle has joined the ranks of the Peggle Masters. Meet him in 15 exciting new levels. The full update includes:

• Buddy’s draggable bucket – catch your ball to launch a rocket-fueled peg explosion
• Warp Holes that allow you to blast through one and out another

Thanks for playing! As always, please tell us what you think of the game by rating us after each update.

Peggle Master Phoebee is swarming in with 15 sweet new levels! The full update includes:

• Master Phoebee and her Bee Bee Gun power – change her cannon into a swarm of bees for 4x the power
• Tricky PopFrogs that hop around, waiting to pop – hit them first and they'll blow up pegs nearby
• Two weeks of new daily puzzles in our lucky St. Patrick’s Day Party

Thanks for playing! Remember to rate us after each update.

Hello Pegglers! We've made some behind-the-scenes enhancements to increase in-game magic! Thanks as always for playing, and please rate us after each update.

Greetings, Blasters! Get ready for a Pegglicious new feature and thrilling ways to play in our latest update, which includes:

• Warren the Rabbit and his Lucky Spin power – he’s back with 15 magical new levels
• The chance to win awesome prizes in our limited-time Peggle Institute event

Thanks for playing! Let us know what you think of the game by rating us after each update.

You’ve battled evil master Fnord in head-to-head challenges and proven yourself as a worthy adversary. In this latest update, Fnord has had a change of heart – he’s on your side! Play as Fnord in 15 dubious new levels and harness his magical power, the Superior Guide, to experience all the aim of Bjorn’s Super Guide with even more firepower.

New achievements have also been added, so keep on blastin’. Thanks for playing!

You’ve battled evil master Fnord in head-to-head challenges and proven yourself as a worthy adversary. In this latest update, Fnord has had a change of heart – he’s on your side! You’ve battled evil master Fnord in head-to-head challenges and proven yourself as a worthy adversary. In this latest update, Fnord has had a change of heart – he’s on your side! Play as Fnord in 15 dubious new levels and harness his magical power, the Superior Guide, to experience all the aim of Bjorn’s Super Guide with even more firepower.

New achievements have also been added, so keep on blastin’. Thanks for playing!

In this latest update, Fnord has stolen Peggle and it’s up to you to win it back! Play against your favorite masters on your journey to wrestle Peggle from Fnord’s heinous hooves. Defeat Fnord and become a Peggle Master! Replay levels with unlimited lives, find secret pegs, and earn stars to fill up the new Star Bar.

We’ve also added new achievements and Daily Challenges for a chance to win rewards every day. Thanks for playing!
